snippet.title: I.RULE teaser!
snippet.description:
le musique - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q9nzkegoLVc

I.RULE is a tower-defense fangame based on The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth, an indie roguelike designed by Edmund McMillen and developed and published by Nicalis.

This game is my tribute to Ed and George Fan, authors of Basement Collection and Plants vs. Zombies, whose game mechanics I tried to combine in this poopy "crossover", if you can call it that. It's a roguelite where you fight monster hordes using babies with different abilities, based on familiars from The Binding of Isaac. Fight bosses, complete various challenges and craft the most effective strategy to win! And if you haven't played TBoI or Plants vs. Zombies yet, you should buy them right now.

#thebindingofisaac #fangame #towerdefense #plantsvszombies
